java/liquibase/change/CreateViewChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.CreateViewStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.View;
00008 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00009 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00011 
00012 import java.util.Arrays;
00013 import java.util.HashSet;
00014 import java.util.Set;
00015 
00019 public class CreateViewChange extends AbstractChange {
00020 
00021     private String schemaName;
00022     private String viewName;
00023     private String selectQuery;
00024     private Boolean replaceIfExists;
00025 
00026     public CreateViewChange() {
00027         super("createView", "Create View");
00028     }
00029 
00030     public String getSchemaName() {
00031         return schemaName;
00032     }
00033 
00034     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00035         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00036     }
00037 
00038     public String getViewName() {
00039         return viewName;
00040     }
00041 
00042     public void setViewName(String viewName) {
00043         this.viewName = viewName;
00044     }
00045 
00046     public String getSelectQuery() {
00047         return selectQuery;
00048     }
00049 
00050     public void setSelectQuery(String selectQuery) {
00051         this.selectQuery = selectQuery;
00052     }
00053 
00054     public Boolean getReplaceIfExists() {
00055         return replaceIfExists;
00056     }
00057 
00058     public void setReplaceIfExists(Boolean replaceIfExists) {
00059         this.replaceIfExists = replaceIfExists;
00060     }
00061 
00062     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00063         boolean replaceIfExists = false;
00064         if (getReplaceIfExists() != null && getReplaceIfExists()) {
00065             replaceIfExists = true;
00066         }
00067         return new SqlStatement[]{
00068                 new CreateViewStatement(getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getViewName(), getSelectQuery(), replaceIfExists),
00069         };
00070     }
00071 
00072     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00073         return "View "+getViewName()+" created";
00074     }
00075 
00076     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00077         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("createView");
00078 
00079         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00080             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00081         }
00082 
00083         element.setAttribute("viewName", getViewName());
00084         element.appendChild(currentChangeLogFileDOM.createTextNode(getSelectQuery()));
00085 
00086         return element;
00087     }
00088 
00089     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00090         DropViewChange inverse = new DropViewChange();
00091         inverse.setViewName(getViewName());
00092 
00093         return new Change[]{
00094                 inverse
00095         };
00096     }
00097 
00098     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00099         View dbObject = new View();
00100         dbObject.setName(viewName);
00101 
00102         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(dbObject));
00103     }
00104 
00105 }
